title: Twa corbies. Spring and winter
creator_contributor_role: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, production company
subject_group: Crafts & Visual Arts/Art and motion pictures
abstract: Twa corbies (traditional ballad)--Spring and winter (William Shakespeare)
description: Episode number 1 of Series "Painter and poet: an experiment in words, music and paintings". The first part of a series devised by John Maude and Michael Warre incorporating the works of writers, painters and musicians to create an experimental animated film. This part consists of two short films. 'Twa corbies' by anonymous narrated by John Laurie, drawings by Michael Rothenstien (2:24 mins). 'Spring and winter' by William Shakespeare, music by Dr. Arne and sung by Peter Pears, drawings by Mervyn Peake (5:40 mins). Photography by W. Traylor and R. Turk, music by Matyas Seiber, edited by Jack King.
related_objects: Series; S01307; Painter and poet: an experiment in words, music and paintings; Active; 1951
